Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    co.poynt.os.services.v1.IPoyntSecondScreenService.capturePhone(String, SecondScreenLabels, SecondScreenLabels, IPoyntSecondScreenPhoneEntryListener)
    in favor of capturePhoneWithOptions
    co.poynt.os.services.v1.IPoyntSecondScreenService.collectEmailAddress(String, IPoyntSecondScreenEmailEntryListener)
    in favor of captureEmailAddress
    co.poynt.os.services.v1.IPoyntSecondScreenService.collectPhoneNumber(IPoyntSecondScreenPhoneEntryListener)
    in favor of capturePhoneNumber
    co.poynt.os.services.v1.IPoyntSecondScreenService.collectTip(Transaction, IPoyntSecondScreenTipEntryListener)
    in favor of captureTip
    co.poynt.os.model.Payment.getReferenceId()
    replaced by getReferences()
    co.poynt.os.model.Payment.isDebit()
    co.poynt.os.model.Payment.isDisableDebitCards()
    co.poynt.os.services.v1.IPoyntReceiptDecoratorServiceListener.onReceiptDecorated(String, PrintedReceipt)
    in favor of IPoyntReceiptDecoratorListener
    co.poynt.os.services.v1.IPoyntReceiptPrintingService.printBalanceInquiry(String, BalanceInquiry, IPoyntReceiptPrintingServiceListener)
    use printBalanceInquiryWithOptions() Print a balance inquiry receipt to the onboard printer The format is predetermined as required by the balance inquiry processor.
    co.poynt.os.services.v1.IPoyntReceiptPrintingService.printBitmap(String, Bitmap, IPoyntReceiptPrintingServiceListener)
    please use PoyntPrinterService. Print a receipt Bitmap to the onboard printer representing an order.
    co.poynt.os.services.v1.IPoyntReceiptPrintingService.printReceipt(String, PrintedReceipt, IPoyntReceiptPrintingServiceListener)
    please use PoyntPrinterService. Print a receipt to the onboard printer representing an order. The order of the contents will be as follow: PrintedReceipt.headerImage (if provided) PrintedReceipt.header PrintedReceipt.body PrintedReceipt.footer PrintedReceipt.footerImage (if provided) The text header/body/footer can be any text content the client chooses. The optional headerImage and footerImage are byte arrays representing Bitmap image of the client's choosing.
    co.poynt.os.services.v1.IPoyntReceiptPrintingService.printTransaction(String, Transaction, long, boolean, IPoyntReceiptPrintingServiceListener)
    please use printReceiptWithOptions() method Print a receipt to the onboard printer representing a transaction. The format is predetermined as required by the transaction processor. The details of the transactions will be automatically loaded from the Poynt Transaction service.
    co.poynt.os.services.v1.IPoyntSecondScreenService.scanCode(IPoyntSecondScreenCodeScanListener)
    in favor of captureCode Displays the scan code (barcode, qrcode, etc.) screen to the customer.
    co.poynt.os.model.Payment.setDebit(boolean)
    co.poynt.os.model.Payment.setDisableDebitCards(boolean)
    co.poynt.os.model.Payment.setReferenceId(String)
    replaced by setReferences()
